typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as date,
		UnitPrice as float,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DataLake
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LookUpCustomer
LookUpCustomerName split(UnitPrice>1 && UnitPrice<4
,
	UnitPrice>3 && UnitPrice<4
,
	disjoint: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Stream1, Stream2, DefaultStream)
DataLake, LookUpCustomer lookup(CustomerID == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookUpCustomerName
ConditionalSplit1@Stream1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesData_Target.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SalesDataTargetFile
ConditionalSplit1@Stream2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesDataTarget2.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@DefaultStream sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesDataTargetDefault.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
